bboxes.raw_text:
Arizona has new state welter-
weight boxing champion. Bonnie
McCorvey, l44 8 "a FOUNDER. kept
his opponent Mott busy. He won
a unanimous decision. Only ESQ
persons viewed the fight In
Madison Square Garden.


When baking a cake that calls
for melted shortening, melt it in
the cake pan you will use. Result
your pan is creased! And you
save washing an extra pan.

NEW YORK Cleveland's star
fullback Jimmy Brown declared
that he Is "all for" the Black
Muslims.


In the current issue Of Look
Magazine Brown discusses the
Negr0s fight for equality. Brown
says he Is not a Muslin. yet
I'm all for them because we need
every possible element going for
us. The more commotion. the bet
ter"


Declaring that the Black Mus

Inns basic attitude toward whites
is shared by almost 9 per cent
of the Negro population" Brown
warned that the Negroes mood Is
"explosive'' and "the white man
had better start trying to under
stand him."


He expressed skepticism OF
Negro leader Martin Luther
Kings philoso phy Of turning
the other cheek" and gaining
equality through "love."

Mr.. and Mrs. c. V. Nelson,
ol3 S. Sixth Ave., are grand
parents again. Mr.. and Mrs.
Nelson Of Los Angeles announced
the birth of girl weighing E
pounds.


George Grimmitt, 1850 W.
Magnolia was visited byhis rela-
tives. He wounded himself with
a shotgun and he is in the county
hospital.


Sgt. and Mrs. Brady Heron
and their three children are living
here now at I'LL E. Atlanta. They
moved here from Hawaii.


Mrs. Roberta Williams family
held agrand reunion and barbecue
at the home of Mr.. and Mrs.
Charles Williams, 3842 w. Lat
ham. Among those present we're
the Billy Williams family andthe
Irving Matthews family.


Cleveland Jackson, 733 S. 10th
Avenue Is very i'll.

MIAMI BEACH. Fla. = Heavy
weight champion Cassius Clay
has stepped up drills for his Nov.
l6 title defense against Sonny
Liston in Boston.

can lay your hands lump to then why
thousands of other Valley do: peck away at
savings account by saving your chicken feed


food for thought, isn't it

The best way to get nest egg


is to save your chicken feed!

Medallion Social and Civic Club held It's install
aton dinner meeting Smokehouse Restaurant Friday

are Opal Crimes PRESIDENT Eloise MCreay secre
tary Dolly Boyer Gloria Evans treasurer ee BROOKS
Julie Engram. asst. secretary.

Jones' Yvonne Huff PRESIDENT Bete Oos wee

Arizona has new state welter-
